database.name: VIEW EFIN_BUDGETADJ_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS efin_budgetadj_v_id, t1.ad_client_id, t1.ad_org_id, t1.isactive, t1.created, t1.createdby, t1.updated, t1.updatedby, t1.efin_budgetadjline_id, t1.increase, t1.decrease, t2.efin_budgetadj_id, t3.efin_budgetlines_id FROM efin_budgetadjline t1 JOIN efin_budgetadj t2 ON t1.efin_budgetadj_id = t2.efin_budgetadj_id JOIN efin_budgetlines t3 ON t3.efin_budgetlines_id = t1.efin_budgetlines_id
